casebody.data:
Benjamin T. HOLT, Appellant,
v.
Adele L. HOLT, Respondent. WD 81628 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: June 25, 2019 Helen Wade, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Gary Stamper, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Three: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Anthony Rex Gabbert, and Edward R. Ardini, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Dr. Benjamin T. Holt appeals a Boone County Circuit Court judgment entered on a second motion to modify the maintenance awarded in an April 2009 dissolution. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
